user.title: Dell iDRAC Setup
user.description: Connect to your Dell iDRAC for comprehensive server monitoring and control.

data_description.host: Enter the IP address or hostname of your Dell iDRAC
data_description.connection_type:
Choose how to connect:
• **Redfish API**: Full control with system management
• **SNMP Only**: Fast monitoring without controls
• **Hybrid**: SNMP monitoring + Redfish controls (recommended)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to update sensor readings

redfish.title: Redfish API Setup
redfish.description: Configure API access to {host} for full server control and monitoring.

data_description.port: HTTPS port for iDRAC web interface
data_description.verify_ssl: Verify SSL certificates (disable for self-signed certificates)
data_description.request_timeout: Maximum time to wait for API responses
data_description.session_timeout: How long to keep the connection active

snmp_version.title: SNMP Version Selection
snmp_version.description: Choose the SNMP version for {host}. SNMP v3 is more secure but requires additional authentication.

data_description.snmp_version:
Choose SNMP protocol version:
• **v2c**: Simple setup with community string
• **v3**: Secure setup with username and authentication

snmp_v2c.title: SNMP v2c Credentials
snmp_v2c.description: Enter your SNMP v2c community string for {host}.

data_description.community: SNMP community string (usually 'public' for read-only access)

snmp_v3.title: SNMP v3 Credentials
snmp_v3.description: Enter your SNMP v3 authentication details for {host}. All fields are required for secure communication.

hybrid_redfish.title: Hybrid Mode - Redfish Controls
hybrid_redfish.description: Step 1 of 2: Configure Redfish API for {host}. This will be used for control operations like LED and system resets.

data_description.session_timeout: Session timeout for control operations (10-180 seconds)

hybrid_snmp_version.title: Hybrid Mode - SNMP Version
hybrid_snmp_version.description: Step 2 of 2: Choose SNMP version for data collection from {host}.

data_description.snmp_version:
Choose SNMP protocol version:
• **v2c**: Simple setup with community string
• **v3**: Secure setup with username and authentication

hybrid_snmp_v2c.title: Hybrid Mode - SNMP v2c Credentials
hybrid_snmp_v2c.description: Enter your SNMP v2c community string for data collection from {host}.

data_description.community: SNMP community string for data collection (usually 'public')

hybrid_snmp_v3.title: Hybrid Mode - SNMP v3 Credentials
hybrid_snmp_v3.description: Enter your SNMP v3 authentication details for data collection from {host}.

data_description.username: SNMP v3 username for data collection
